name: Plunker (itch)
description:
Become Agent Plunker in a hilariously mind blowing virtual reality adventure. Scour the plane for clues, and try not to piss too many passengers off on the way. Play through a full campaign loaded with minigames and jokes, like parachuting, bocce ball, and punching a fat guy on a toilet, or just play the endless minigames on their own after a single playthrough. Even after you play through once, try it a second time to explore extra paths through the nonlinear storyline.

The game has no set price, especially since it is only a work in progress demo, but if you want to support the development of this game and make sure it gets finished without me starving to death on the way, I sincerely appreciate every bit. Every bowl of ramen counts as one more night I won't have to stop development to fund myself through gainful employment.
